name: FNF - Vs. Shaggy x Matt
description:
The hardest boss & The most powerful entity are joining forces to bring you one of the most challenging experiences in Friday Night Funkin'!

This mod contains 3 songs:
Power Link - Matt goes against shaggy to receive his power
Revenge - Matt uses his new power to beat bf once and for all
Final Destination - Matt & Shaggy sing together against bf

It also includes a secret re-chart you can play only after beating the week, but you won't be ready.
